property.name: include
property.value: Map:Common Data

properties.property:
An empty room, what used to be [[Tenna]]'s shop on the [[Desert Board]]. It displays text depending on the game state.
'''Has the [[Sword (Sword Route)|Sword]]:''' BECOME STRONGER
'''LV 3:''' BECAME STRONGER
'''LV MAX (black text):''' Having fun?

property.name: description
property.value: A Sword in what used to be the Secret Mailroom on the [[Desert Board]]. Allows Little Kris to kill the monsters on the board to become stronger.

property.name: page
property.value: Sword (Sword Route)

property.name: description
property.value: Treasure chest in the out-of-bounds area containing the Ice Key.

property.name: page
property.value: Ice Key

property.name: description
property.value: A Blue Fish monster. Swims in the water, but lunges at Little Kris when approached.

property.name: description
property.value: A Purple Monster. Walks around in random directions, harming Little Kris when touched.

property.value: A Purple Monster. Walks around in random directions, harming Little Kris when touched.

property.value: A Yellow Monster. Attacks by shooting red arrows at Little Kris.

property.name: description
property.value: A pair of pink and yellow eyes, constituting one half of the FRIEND's face. They appear when walking towards the bottom-left tile of the room.

property.name: description
property.value: A mouth, constituting one half of the FRIEND's face. It appears when walking toward the top-right tile of the room.

property.name: description
property.value: Sits in the center of the room. Flies away when approached, leaving behind black text that reads "See you soon."

property.name: page
property.value: Shadow Mantle Holder

property.name: description
property.value: A room with many stairwells, all of which lead to the room with the [[Shadow Mantle Holder]]. They disappear upon leaving the secret room, preventing re-entry.

property.name: page
property.value: Desert Board (Sword Route)#Secret Stairs

property.name: description
property.value: A cold area, initially blocked off and inaccessible on the previous [[Desert Board]].

property.name: page
property.value: Desert Board (Sword Route)#Cold Area

property.name: description
property.value: An infinitely looping room full of trees. Passing into this area prevents re-entry into the main map, and Little Kris must continue in any direction until they find the [[Ice Key]].

property.name: page
property.value: Desert Board (Sword Route)#Out of Bounds
